slide.title: Command Line Interface
slide.blurb: In the PHP 4 distributions you will find the following binaries:

list.bullet: php.exe (The CGI binary to use with a web server)
*cli/*php.exe (The CLI binary to use with command line scripts)

slide.blurb: In the PHP 5 distributions you will find the following binaries:

list.bullet: php*-cgi*.exe (The CGI binary to use with a web server)
php.exe (The CLI binary to use with command line scripts)
